vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συμπαρα-μένω,
future -μενῶ[Refs 1st c.BC+]:—stay along with or among, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; [γυνὴ] ἀτυχοῦντι συμπαρέμεινεν [Refs 4th c.BC+][same place]; endure as long as, τῷ βίῳ [Refs 4th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to continue
to stay with (someone) to help
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 住在一起,為了幫助對方 (腓 1:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 住在一起,为了帮助对方 (腓 1:25)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cùng còn ở lại; còn ở lại với; tiếp tục ở với. σύν (G4862) + παραμένω (G3887)
